title: (x) Wedding Celebration script - ITC Edwardian Script {Yves}
content:
Please help to identify this font (see attachment). Its CAPs look like Shelley\>Andante. What do you think? Thanks.

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [DSC01121.JPG](http://web.archive.org/web/20131019231824/http:/typophile.com/files/DSC01121.JPG) | 22.95 KB |
author: tddots

comments.content: This is [ITC Edwardian Script](http://web.archive.org/web/20131019231824/http:/www.fontshop.com/index.cfm?fuseaction=catalog.fontdetail&displayfontid=ITC.9256.1.2&attributes.sampleSize=32&sampleText=The+Wedding+Celebration+of+.&sampleSize=32), the Alternate weight.
Thanks for the link, smartypants. I'll keep it in mind. ;^)
Thank you very much! The links are very helpful too.
